DC Shunt Motor Environments¶

DC Shunt Base Motor¶

class gym_electric_motor.envs.gym_dcm.dcm_shunt._DCMShunt(zero_refs=(), **kwargs)[source]¶
Description:
An environment for a discrete controlled DC Shunt Motor. The armature and excitation circuit are in parallel.

Observation:

Type: Dict(Box,Box,Box,Box,Box)

Name Observation
omega Angular Velocity
torque Electrical Torque
i_a Armature Current
i_e Excitation Current
u Input Voltage
u_sup Supply Voltage
References

References in the same order as the state variables

Action Space:
Depends on the converter and if a continuous or discrete action should be used. It is the applied voltage.
Reward:
See DCM Base Environment
Starting State:
Random initial state, that fulfills some plausibility constraints
Episode Termination:
An episode terminates, when all the steps in the reference have been simulated or limits are violated.

DC Discretely Controlled Shunt Motor¶

Environment ID: emotor-dc-shunt-disc-v0

class gym_electric_motor.envs.gym_dcm.dcm_shunt.DCMShuntDisc(converter_type='2Q', tau=1e-05, **kwargs)[source]¶

DC Continuously Controlled Shunt Motor¶

Environment ID: emotor-dc-shunt-cont-v0

class gym_electric_motor.envs.gym_dcm.dcm_shunt.DCMShuntCont(converter_type='2Q', tau=0.0001, **kwargs)[source]¶
step(action)[source]¶

Clips the action to its limits and uses the base step function

Parameters:action – desired switching state of the converter that should be applied
Returns:observation: The observation from the environment

reward: The reward for the taken action

bool: Flag if the episode has ended

info: An always empty dictionary
Return type:Tuple(array(float), float, bool, dict)
